title: Interruptions
creator_credit: Thomas MacNeil, William Hoke, Pacific Northwest Bell Telephone Company and Hoke Productions
brief_description: This film shows how seven individuals have accepted their disabilities and learned to transcend their limitations. It also shows how employers have dispensed of common prejudices and have employed handicapped individuals, and have found them to be effective workers.
